Desc.eng: Ah, Van Helsing! I see you’ve found the fang of a mighty dragon. Don’t worry, I’ll pulverize it and you’ll have your cure in no time!
What are you talking about? I’m not ill. It’s a trophy from a mythical beast.
Ach, a misunderstanding! Ehhehe! Allow me to buy it from you, then. Somebody else with… severe heart problems… would pay a hefty sum for it!
